title: A Year to Remember 1939
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/World War, 1939-1945
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/World War, 1939-1945 - Japan
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia - Armed forces - Women
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Cockatoo Island Dockyard (N.S.W.)
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/National socialism
description: Collection of newsreel footage which made up Australia's history in 1939 - Rise of Nazi Germany - Japanese onslaught against China - Australia's small, poorly equipped armed forces - Air raid precautions born - HMAS "Parramatta" launched at Cockatoo Dockyard - Devastating bushfires - Nancy Bird, commandant of Australian Women's Air Training Corp - Wrestling Chief Little Wolf - Decima Norman wins five gold medals at Empire Games ... and much more Rated: G.
